title: Comment on Hess et al. Phys. Rev. Lett. {\bf 130}, 207001 (2023)
abstract: In this comment, we show that the model introduced in Hess et al. Phys. Rev. Lett. {\bf 130}, 207001 (2023) fails the topological gap protocol (TGP) (Pikulin et al., arXiv:2103.12217 and M. Aghaee et al., Phys. Rev. B 107, 245424 (2023)). In addition, we discuss this model in the broader context of how the TGP has been benchmarked.
